description: Retrieves a service graph for one or more specific trace IDs.

parameters.name: TraceIds
parameters.description: Trace IDs of requests for which to generate a service graph. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Services
nested_items.description: The services that have processed one of the specified requests.

nested_items.name: ReferenceId
nested_items.description: Identifier for the service. Unique within the service map.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The canonical name of the service.

nested_items.name: Names
nested_items.description: A list of names for the service, including the canonical name.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Root
nested_items.description: Indicates that the service was the first service to process a request.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the Amazon Web Services account in which the service runs.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of service.

Amazon Web Services Resource - The type of an Amazon Web Services resource. For example, AWS::EC2::Instance for an application running on Amazon EC2 or AWS::DynamoDB::Table for an Amazon DynamoDB table that the application used.
Amazon Web Services Service - The type of an Amazon Web Services service. For example, AWS::DynamoDB for downstream calls to Amazon DynamoDB that didn't target a specific table.
client - Represents the clients that sent requests to a root service.
remote - A downstream service of indeterminate type.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The service's state.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the first segment that the service generated.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the last segment that the service generated.

nested_items.name: Edges
nested_items.description: Connections to downstream services.

nested_items.name: ReferenceId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the edge. Unique within a service map.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the first segment on the edge.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the last segment on the edge.

nested_items.name: SummaryStatistics
nested_items.description: Response statistics for segments on the edge.

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that completed with a 2xx Success status code.

nested_items.name: ErrorStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: ThrottleCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with a 429 throttling status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 4xx Client Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: FaultStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 5xx Server Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of completed requests.

nested_items.name: TotalResponseTime
nested_items.description: The aggregate response time of completed requests.

nested_items.name: ResponseTimeHistogram
nested_items.description: A histogram that maps the spread of client response times on an edge. Only populated for synchronous edges.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the entry.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The prevalence of the entry.

nested_items.name: Aliases
nested_items.description: Aliases for the edge.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The canonical name of the alias.

nested_items.name: Names
nested_items.description: A list of names for the alias, including the canonical name.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the alias.

nested_items.name: EdgeType
nested_items.description: Describes an asynchronous connection, with a value of link.

nested_items.name: ReceivedEventAgeHistogram
nested_items.description: A histogram that maps the spread of event age when received by consumers. Age is calculated each time an event is received. Only populated when EdgeType is link.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the entry.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The prevalence of the entry.

nested_items.name: SummaryStatistics
nested_items.description: Aggregated statistics for the service.

nested_items.name: OkCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that completed with a 2xx Success status code.

nested_items.name: ErrorStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: ThrottleCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with a 429 throttling status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 4xx Client Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 4xx Client Error status code.

nested_items.name: FaultStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: OtherCount
nested_items.description: The number of requests that failed with untracked 5xx Server Error status codes.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of requests that failed with a 5xx Server Error status code.

nested_items.name: TotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of completed requests.

nested_items.name: TotalResponseTime
nested_items.description: The aggregate response time of completed requests.

nested_items.name: DurationHistogram
nested_items.description: A histogram that maps the spread of service durations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the entry.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The prevalence of the entry.

nested_items.name: ResponseTimeHistogram
nested_items.description: A histogram that maps the spread of service response times.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the entry.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The prevalence of the entry.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token.
